title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Elke Rödel's Profile
description: Meet Elke Rödel, an EU customs consultant at Trade Duty Refund, specializing in customs compliance, risk management, and AEO certification. Discover expert support in optimizing your company's customs operations and achieving regulatory efficiency.
bio: Elke Rödel is a dedicated customs consultant specializing in the development and evaluation of organizational customs policies. Her expertise in customs compliance, risk management, and policy implementation supports companies in achieving strong, effective customs operations. Elke is a member of the TR NL management team
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>Customs Compliance & Risk Management</strong>: Elke excels at identifying and mitigating customs-related risks by designing robust compliance strategies. She ensures organizations meet evolving regulatory requirements while creating efficient, risk-conscious customs management systems.</li><li><strong>Internal Control Program Implementation</strong>:  Elke is highly skilled in setting up and executing internal control programs that enhance customs policy effectiveness. Her structured approach allows for consistent monitoring and continual improvement of customs processes.</li><li><strong>AEO Certification & Customs Permits</strong>: With extensive experience in obtaining and managing AEO certifications and other customs permits, Elke streamlines the authorization process and supports clients in maintaining trusted trader status for optimal trade facilitation.</li></ul>
geo: Elke’s expertise is principally in the EU.
